intro: Nemesia pallida, commonly known as the pale nemesia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its delicate, showy flowers that range in color from white to pale pink. Nemesia pallida is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in cooler climates.
